rating_comment:
Great initiative in Brahmanbaria.
Host was extremely cooperative and the building staff was helpful.
Location is easy to find, and almost close to happening areas.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Honestly, this listing exceeded expectations because it captured our eyes due to its professional photos of rooms and space, and when we entered for check in, it greatly met our expectations for room space and size. Overall a great place to stay in, whether it’s a couple days or a week. Can bring a full family, and still be comfortable with 4 bedrooms and multiple bathrooms, or can lavishly enjoy with one friend alone. Location is optimal, we had many restaurants surrounding us and for emergencies, a couple stores with water liters and one time meals were right next to us. Multiple bathrooms, some in our bedrooms, made things easier and more accessible for day to day living. Overall, the apartment has great amenities that provide more for you than every single Airbnb in this area. Even the placement of sofas in the living room were designed nicely and allowed for the comfortable sleep-on-the-couch night experience you only receive at home. 10/10 outstanding stay, definitely recommend.
